mapper.update: update exp_template set template_title = #{templateTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, template_body = #{templateBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, template_desc = #{templateDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, template_module = #{templateModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, template_type = #{templateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_Date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, template_title, template_body, template_desc, template_module, template_type, create_id, update_id, create_date, update_Date from exp_template where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
